class_notes: Must complete OCCP before registration.  Must enroll in Chem 150L.
course_description: This course will build a strong foundation in atomic and molecular structure. Students will interpret experimental data to explain structure, properties, and relationships. Mandatory chemistry 150 Online Placement Module must be completed prior to enrollment in class. Students who withdraw from the lecture must withdraw from the laboratory course also. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 150L co-requisite. During the enrollment process, student must enroll in CHEM_OX 150L first, to be able to enroll in CHEM_OX 150. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at the end of preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
